title: The Matrix
description: A hacker learns the nature of his reality and his role in a war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals secrets through dream-sharing tech is offered a chance to erase his past.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple falls in love in the 1940s but are separated by war.

title: Interstellar
description: A team explores a wormhole to save mankind.

title: Titanic
description: A 17-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a poor artist on the Titanic.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman must face the Joker, a criminal mastermind.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A slow-witted man witnesses and influences historic events.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: Superheroes try to reverse the damage caused by Thanos.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.

title: Shutter Island
description: Two U.S. marshals investigate the disappearance of a prisoner.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians become bitter rivals.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the founding of Facebook.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory and clashes with his teacher.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by dark forces.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: A boy discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday.

title: Inside Out
description: After moving to a new city, a young girl’s emotions conflict on how to deal with a new life.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured, a timid clownfish sets out to bring him home.

title: Joker
description: A failed comedian spirals into madness and becomes a criminal icon.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The adventures of a legendary concierge and his protégé.

title: The Babadook
description: A single mother battles her son's fear of a mysterious monster.

title: The Imitation Game
description: Alan Turing attempts to crack the German Enigma code during WWII.

title: Free Solo
description: Follows Alex Honnold as he attempts to climb El Capitan without ropes.
